title: Ep. 547 - SJWs Defend Racial And Ideological Discrimination At Goodyear
description:
Today on the Matt Walsh Show, Goodyear was exposed for its discriminatory policy allowing “black lives matter” but not “all lives matter” or “blue lives matter.” The media has rushed to the company’s defense. But leaked audio now shows that the policy is worse than we thought. Also Five Headlines including a stirring speech from a pop star at the DNC convention last night. And in our Daily Cancellation, we’ll discuss the vile left wing mob that randomly destroyed a man’s life because of an innocent typo in a tweet.
